description: A cienaCesRstpPortBackupNotification is sent when the
device detects a self loop (such as, the same cable connected to
two ports on the same device). To enable the device to send this
notification: cienaCesPortAllTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState
for the port, and cienaCesRstpPortBackupTrapState must be set to enabled. These
objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, and dot1dStpPort.

event.Summary: RSTP backup self loop detected on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpPortBackupNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The object indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex

description: The object indicates the shelf index for the port used for trap definition.

description: The port number of the port for which this entry
contains Spanning Tree Protocol management information.
variables.name: BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort

description: A cienaCesRstpPvstBpduReceivedNotification is sent when a PVST BPDU is received
on the port. This trap is sent out every minute. To enable the device to send this
notification: cienaCesPortAllTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState
for the port, and cienaCesRstpPortPvstBPduReceivedTrapState must be set to enabled.
These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, and dot1dStpPort.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpPvstBpduReceivedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The object indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex

description: The port number of the port for which this entry
contains Spanning Tree Protocol management information.
variables.name: BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort

description: A cienaCesRstpSelfLoopNotification is sent when the device detects the same
cable connected to a port in a loop back. Also, if loop-back blocking is enabled
on the device, RSTP blocks this port (self disable). To enable the device to send
this notification: cienaCesPortAllTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState
for the port, and cienaCesRstpPortSelfLoopTrapState must be set to enabled. These
are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, and dot1dStpPort.

event.Summary: RSTP self loop detected on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpSelfLoopNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999

variables.name: BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort

description: A cienaCesRstpPortOperEdgeNotification trap is sent when the device detects a port
RSTP OperEdge change. To enable the device to send this notification:
cienaCesPortAllTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState for the port,
and cienaCesRstpPortOperEdgeTrapState must be set to enabled. These objects are set
to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, dot1dStpPort, and dot1dStpPortOperEdgePort.

event.Summary: RSTP Edge Port parameter set to $v8 on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpPortOperEdgeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999 RSTP-MIB::dot1dStpPortOperEdgePort i 1

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex

description: The port number of the port for which this entry
contains Spanning Tree Protocol management information.
variables.name: BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort

description: The operational value of the Edge Port parameter. The
object is initialized to the value of the corresponding
instance of dot1dStpPortAdminEdgePort. When the
corresponding instance of dot1dStpPortAdminEdgePort is
set, this object will be changed as well. This object
will also be changed to false on reception of a BPDU.
variables.name: RSTP-MIB::dot1dStpPortOperEdgePort

description: A cienaCesRstpPortFlapNotification trap is sent when the device detects a port
flapping. This trap is generated if the device detects that a port flapped more
than once within 1 minute timer period and it has not sent trap within last 5
minutes. To enable the device to send this notification: cienaCesPortAllTrapState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState for the port, and
cienaCesRstpPortFlapTrapState must be set to enable. These objects are set to
enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, and dot1dStpPort.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpPortFlapNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999

variables.name: BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort

description: A cienaCesRstpBridgeRootPortLostNotification trap is sent when the device detects
that the bridge root port is lost. This trap indicates either the link failure or
link partner RSTP disabled. To enable the device to send this notification:
cienaCesPortAllTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState for the port, and
cienaCesRstpBridgeRootPortLostTrapState must be set to enabled. These objects are set
to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber, and dot1dStpPort.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'RSTP bridge root port ($v7) lost notification cleared' : 'RSTP bridge root port ($v7) lost notification occurred'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-RSTP-MIB::cienaCesRstpBridgeRootPortLostNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 BRIDGE-MIB::dot1dStpPort i 9999
